result.html: An raibh gruaig airDid it have hair?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ gruaig airDid it have hair?

result.eng: It was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ga: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.orig: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.html: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradhIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ponchtml: B'iad na Normannaiġ a ṫosaiġ an nós féasóg a ḃearraḋ agus gruaig a ġearraḋIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.

result.ga: Bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthi
result.orig: Bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthi
result.html: Bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthiShe had gold-coloured hair.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí folt ar ḋaṫ an óir uirṫiShe had gold-coloured hair.

result.ga: Cén dath atá ar do chuid gruaige
result.orig: Cén dath atá ar do chuid gruaige
result.html: Cén dath atá ar do chuid gruaigeWhat colour is your hair?
result.ponchtml: Cén daṫ atá ar do ċuid gruaigeWhat colour is your hair?

result.html: Ghearr mé mo chuid gruaigeI've cut my hair.
result.ponchtml: Ġearr mé mo ċuid gruaigeI've cut my hair.

result.html: Níl aon ghruaig ormI have no hair.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon ġruaig ormI have no hair.

result.eng: He doesn't have much hair on his head.

result.orig: Níl mórán gruaige ar a cheann
result.html: Níl mórán gruaige ar a cheannHe doesn't have much hair on his head.
result.ponchtml: Níl mórán gruaige ar a ċeannHe doesn't have much hair on his head.

result.eng: She begins to comb her hair.
result.ga: Tosaíonn sí ag cíoradh a cuid gruaige
result.orig: Tosaíonn sí ag cíoradh a cuid gruaige
result.html: Tosaíonn sí ag cíoradh a cuid gruaigeShe begins to comb her hair.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíonn sí ag cíoraḋ a cuid gruaigeShe begins to comb her hair.

result.ga: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imithe
result.orig: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imithe
result.html: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imitheHis hair is almost gone.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ċuid gruaige beagnaċ imiṫeHis hair is almost gone.

result.ga: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainn

result.html: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainnHer hair is beautiful.
result.ponchtml: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainnHer hair is beautiful.

result.html: Tá do chuid gruaige an-fhadaYour hair is very long.
result.ponchtml: Tá do ċuid gruaige an-ḟadaYour hair is very long.

result.html: Tá gruaig chatach airHe has curly hair.

result.html: Tá gruaig fhionn uirthiShe has blond hair.

result.eng: She would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.
result.ga: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léithe
result.orig: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léithe

result.ponchtml: Ṫaḃarfaḋ sí an leaḃar go raiḃ a ċuid gruaige tar éis dul i léiṫeShe would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.

result.eng: Her hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ga: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.orig: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.html: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteachHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a cuid gruaige greamaiṫe dá baiṫis ag an mbáisteaċHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.html: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradhShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.

result.eng: He grabbed her by her hair.
result.html: Fuair sé greim gruaige uirthiHe grabbed her by her hair.
result.ponchtml: Fuair sé greim gruaige uirṫiHe grabbed her by her hair.
